item.title: [Showoff]The Vreg Blade[Showoff]
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:12, topic:327636”]Sub surface isn’t needed for RSPS models ._. …

And as far as I can see, atleast 28k of those 30k polygons are in the bottom of the handle.[/quote]alright, i remade the model (rs capable) 2k triangles i made 3 versions and i fixed the glitches the sword is now nice and smooth i made 13 pics i think upping them now and ill add the topic in couple of mins

Read full topic

item.title: [Showoff]The Vreg Blade[Showoff]
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Needs a variety of colours really, love the textures you use though, makes me wonder how you do it.

By the way, I’ll only allow one more high poly model here, then I’ll have to move them to the graphics board, models that are not capable of fitting in a 317 client shouldn’t be here according to the rules, but I’m a little lenient.

Read full topic

item.title: [Showoff]The Vreg Blade[Showoff]
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Sub surface isn’t needed for RSPS models ._. …

And as far as I can see, atleast 28k of those 30k polygons are in the bottom of the handle.

Read full topic

item.title: [Showoff]The Vreg Blade[Showoff]
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:10, topic:327636”]A little tip, just before the mods come, all models but be RS2 compatable, so it was a waste to do something with such large polygon just to put it on here. Also, for 30k poly, WHY, i see no point, in a single-color blade, with such high poly. It just tells me one thing. You dont know how to get decient quality, with low poly. I have a plane, sitting at like 1.9k poly, so your sword should be do-able with less than 2k[/quote]i see that you have totally expierience with modeling, ever heard of sub surface?

Read full topic

item.title: [Showoff]The Vreg Blade[Showoff]
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

A little tip, just before the mods come, all models but be RS2 compatable, so it was a waste to do something with such large polygon just to put it on here. Also, for 30k poly, WHY, i see no point, in a single-color blade, with such high poly. It just tells me one thing. You dont know how to get decient quality, with low poly. I have a plane, sitting at like 1.9k poly, so your sword should be do-able with less than 2k

Read full topic

Thats 30,000 poly? tbh, you should remove the subsurfacing. the design isnt bad, but tbh, for swords, subsurfacing provides an excessive ammount of poly.
